name: Sacrifice
primaryTexts: Release up to 3 of your non-fighter ships from the Cabal.
Place up to 2 of those released units in systems that contains at least one of your space docks.
secondaryTexts: Choose 1 system that contains only your units. Roll 1 die for each non-fighter ship in that system. On a 1-3 the Cabal captures that unit. Then gain a number of Trade Goods equal to the combined value of what was captured.
